Description:
Detects regsvr32 execution to download/install/register new DLLs that are hosted on Web or FTP servers.

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious Regsvr32 HTTP/FTP Pattern
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\regsvr32.exe' and original_file_name = 'regsvr32.exe') and (command like '% /i%' or command like '% -i%') and (command like '%ftp%' or command like '%http%'))
